CustomField.description: Set to TRUE if closed deals should be finalized via the OTC team (e.g. invoice processing). OTC-related tasks are automatically generated for the product when the value is TRUE.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set to TRUE if closed deals should be finalized via the OTC team (e.g. invoice processing). OTC-related tasks are automatically generated for the product when the value is TRUE.
CustomField.label: Processed via O2C
